Meta.categoryDescription: Browse {count} {category} listings on LittleBiggy. Compare prices, read reviews, and shop with Bitcoin. Updated daily.

intro.default: Discover {count} {category} listings from trusted LittleBiggy vendors. Compare prices, read verified buyer reviews, and find the best deals. All items are indexed daily with transparent seller ratings and shipping information.
intro.flower: Browse premium cannabis flower from verified LittleBiggy sellers. From exotic strains like Zkittlez and Gelato to classic favourites, compare prices across vendors and read real buyer reviews before you purchase.
intro.hash: Explore a curated selection of hashish including Moroccan, bubble hash, temple balls, and premium dry sift. Compare quality grades and prices from trusted vendors with verified buyer feedback.
intro.vapes: Shop disposable vapes, cartridges, and vape accessories from LittleBiggy's top-rated sellers. Find live resin carts, distillate pens, and more with transparent pricing and real customer reviews.
intro.edibles: Discover cannabis-infused edibles including gummies, chocolates, capsules, and baked goods. Compare dosages, prices, and read verified reviews to find your perfect product.
intro.concentrates: Browse premium concentrates including wax, shatter, rosin, and live resin. Compare potency, prices, and vendor ratings to find high-quality extracts from trusted sellers.
intro.psychedelics: Explore LittleBiggy's psychedelics selection including LSD, mushrooms, and DMT products. Read verified buyer experiences and compare prices across trusted vendors.
intro.tincture: Shop cannabis tinctures and sublingual products for precise dosing. Compare strengths, prices, and read customer reviews from verified LittleBiggy purchases.
intro.other: Discover unique products and accessories from LittleBiggy vendors. Browse seeds, grow kits, and specialty items with transparent pricing and buyer reviews.

footer.description: Browse LittleBiggy with categories, filters, reviews & seller stats.

community.label: Community
community.text: Join the conversation, share finds, and connect with other buyers.

embassy.label: Need help?
embassy.text: New to LittleBiggy? Our embassy is a community post where you can ask questions and get help in your language.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Biggy Index is an independent browsing tool for LittleBiggy. It lets you search, filter, and compare items across sellers with real reviews, pricing data, and seller statistics — all in one place.
faq.q2: Is Biggy Index affiliated with LittleBiggy?
faq.a2: No. Biggy Index is an independent project. We use referral links so when you click through to LittleBiggy, you support the site at no extra cost to you.
faq.q3: How often is the data updated?
faq.a3: The index is refreshed approximately every 30 minutes. Prices, stock availability, and reviews are kept as current as possible.
faq.a4: Biggy Index currently covers six markets: United Kingdom, Germany, France, Portugal, Italy, and Spain. Each market shows items available in that region with local currency pricing.
faq.q5: How does the price comparison work?
faq.a5: All prices are stored in a common currency and converted to your local currency in real time. You can filter by price range and sort by price to find the best deals across sellers.

meta.disclaimer: Not affiliated with LittleBiggy. Referral links used.

FirstVisitBanner.title: Welcome to the Biggy Index
FirstVisitBanner.description: Browse Little Biggy with categories, filters, reviews & seller stats. New to the marketplace?

LBGuide.title: Before you go to LittleBiggy...
LBGuide.subtitle: Quick tips to help you get started on the marketplace.

country.title: 1. Pick your country
country.text: LittleBiggy serves multiple regions. Make sure you select the right country so you see items that ship to you.

basket.title: 2. Add to basket
basket.text: Found something you like? Tap "Add to Basket" on the item page. You can add items from different sellers.

checkout.title: 3. Checkout with Bitcoin
checkout.text: LittleBiggy accepts Bitcoin only. At checkout you'll see an amount and a wallet address to send payment to.

LBGuide.continueBtn: Got it — take me to LittleBiggy

guideLink.title: Visit the embassy
guideLink.text: Need help? Ask questions and get answers in your language.
